summary: Email correspondence from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to Bureau of Prisons official Nicole McFarland regarding conditions of Ghislaine Maxwell's confinement at MDC Brooklyn. Sternheim requests Maxwell be moved to an interior cell due to moisture, cold, and safety concerns.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, writing to Bureau of Prisons official to request improved conditions for Maxwell's confinement at MDC Brooklyn.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, an inmate at MDC Brooklyn whose attorney is requesting she be moved to an interior cell due to poor conditions.

persons.name: Nicole McFarland
persons.context: Recipient of the email from Bobbi Sternheim, previously intervened regarding Maxwell's conditions. The email chain shows attempts to schedule a call with her.

connections.description: Sternheim is acting as Maxwell's defense attorney, advocating for her improved living conditions in prison.
Sternheim is corresponding with McFarland, a BOP official, regarding her client's prison conditions.
McFarland, as a BOP official, has oversight or influence over the conditions of Maxwell's confinement.

events.title: Attorney Request for Cell Relocation
events.description: Bobbi Sternheim emails Nicole McFarland requesting Ghislaine Maxwell be moved to an interior cell at MDC Brooklyn due to moisture, cold temperatures, and safety concerns.

locations: New York, NY 10011 (Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim)
33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was confined in an isolation cell at MDC Brooklyn as of November 2020.
Her attorney, Bobbi Sternheim, reported that moisture in the cell had degraded envelopes and paperwork, and temperature checks were conducted outside the cell.
Sternheim requested Maxwell be moved to an interior cell to protect her from cold, wind, rain, snow, and moisture seeping through exterior walls.
Prior intervention by BOP official Nicole McFarland had already secured Maxwell permission to use a water mug and possess commissary snacks in her cell.
